titleStmt.title: A true information to the nation, from the people called Quakers. Being a brief account of the proceedings of some of the magistrates in and about this city of London, against the aforesaid people, from the third day of the 5th moneth called July, to the last day of the 6th moneth called August, 1664. Composed and published for satisfaction of those who desire to be informed concerning this matter. By J.C.
titleStmt.author: Crook, John, 1617-1699.

titleStmt.title: A true information to the nation, from the people called Quakers. Being a brief account of the proceedings of some of the magistrates in and about this city of London, against the aforesaid people, from the third day of the 5th moneth called July, to the last day of the 6th moneth called August, 1664. Composed and published for satisfaction of those who desire to be informed concerning this matter. By J.C.
titleStmt.author: Crook, John, 1617-1699.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to John Crook.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
